perturbation.original_text: All material submitted to Distributor will be provided by Distributor to S2K with comments or approval no later than three business days after receipt in AdLit.
perturbation.changed_text: All material submitted to Distributor will be provided by Distributor to S2K with comments or approval no later than ten business days after receipt in AdLit.
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction regarding the timeframe for the Distributor to provide feedback on marketing materials submitted by S2K. Section 2(b)(ii) initially states a three-business-day turnaround, while the modified text extends this to ten business days. This creates uncertainty about the expected response time and could lead to disputes.

perturbation.original_text: If S2K wishes Distributor to perform an expedited review of marketing pieces within one business day of Distributor’ receipt of such marketing pieces, the expedited review will be performed subject to and in accordance with the following:
perturbation.changed_text: If S2K wishes Distributor to perform an expedited review of marketing pieces within five business days of Distributor’ receipt of such marketing pieces, the expedited review will be performed subject to and in accordance with the following:
perturbation.explanation: This change introduces a contradiction regarding the timeframe for the expedited review. The original text indicates one business day, while the modified text extends it to five business days. This creates ambiguity and uncertainty about the actual turnaround time for expedited reviews, potentially leading to disagreements between S2K and the Distributor.

perturbation.original_text: Distributor will review and submit comments to S2K within this timeframe. If Distributor fails to provide S2K with comments within one business day, the $250 expedited review charge will not apply.
perturbation.changed_text: Distributor will review and submit comments to S2K within this timeframe. If Distributor fails to provide S2K with comments within five business days, the $250 expedited review charge will not apply.
perturbation.explanation: This change directly contradicts the original expedited review terms. The original text states that the $250 expedited review charge doesn't apply if comments aren't provided within one business day, now it is modified to five business days, conflicting with the initial claim of a one-day expedited review service elsewhere in the section and creating ambiguity about service fees.
